Ubuntu 18.04


Install Homebrew for Linux

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install build-essential curl file git
/bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install.sh)"
test -d ~/.linuxbrew && eval $(~/.linuxbrew/bin/brew shellenv)
test -d /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew && eval $(/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/bin/brew shellenv)
test -r ~/.bash_profile && echo "eval \$($(brew --prefix)/bin/brew shellenv)" >>~/.bash_profile
echo "eval \$($(brew --prefix)/bin/brew shellenv)" >>~/.profile


Install NVM, NodeJS, NPM

curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.35.3/install.sh | bash
export NVM_DIR="$([ -z "${XDG_CONFIG_HOME-}" ] && printf %s "${HOME}/.nvm" || printf %s "${XDG_CONFIG_HOME}/nvm")"
[ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" # This loads nvm
nvm install 12

Install Tippecanoe

brew install tippecanoe

Install GDAL

brew install gdal
sudo apt-install gdal-bin

mkdir ~/dev
mkdir ~/prod
cd ~/dev
git clone https://github.com/royhobbstn/parcel-processor.git
npm install
cd ~/prod 
git clone https://github.com/royhobbstn/parcel-processor.git
npm install

# manually load in dev and prod configs into the /config directory of each folder

sudo mkdir -p /opt/scripts
sudo touch /opt/scripts/run-script-on-boot.sh
        
crontab -e
@reboot /opt/scripts/run-script-on-boot.sh >> ~/on-boot-output.txt
        
sudo vi /opt/scripts/run-script-on-boot.sh        
        
#!/bin/bash

cd ~/dev/parcel-processor
git pull
npm run worker-dev &
cd ~/prod/parcel-processor
git pull
npm run worker-prod &
        
chmod +x /opt/scripts/run-script-on-boot.sh
